channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israeli settlers beat Palestinian farmers on video as attacks mount during West Bank olive harvest
Democrats Condemn Construction of Trump’s New $250 Million White House Ballroom: ‘You Don’t Put Rims on a Rental’

Beloved Massachusetts ice cream stand ‘forced to close’ after 15 years
‘Why Are You Gay?’ Elon Musk Rages at Top Trump Official Over Loss of Government Contract

WATCH: Part of White House East Wing demolished as Trump begins ballroom construction
item.description: Part of the White House East Wing was demolished on Monday as President Trump sets out to build a massive ballroom.

item.title: 60% of workers are unhappy with key aspects of their job, survey finds
item.description: Six in 10 employees say their jobs are falling short on issues including pay, scheduling and career advancement, a new analysis finds.

item.title: Democrats look to long term as North Carolina GOP redistricting plan seeks another seat for Trump

item.title: Jack Smith's attorneys defend special counsel's analyzing GOP lawmakers' phone data

item.title: WATCH: No plans for Trump and Putin to meet in 'immediate future,' WH official says

item.title: Vance: Israel-Hamas ceasefire "going frankly better than I expected"
item.description: Vice President JD Vance urged "patience" as Israel waits for the return of all the hostages' remains from Hamas.

item.title: Undocumented immigrant, officer hurt in shooting during targeted enforcement stop
item.description: An undocumented immigrant and a law enforcement officer were wounded when officers fired shots during a targeted enforcement traffic stop in Los Angel...

item.title: WATCH: Woman details getting justice nearly 12 years after her sexual assault
item.description: After more than a decade, Shannon Keeler was able to confront the man who confessed to sexually assaulting her at a 2013 fraternity party.

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil appears in appeals court as Trump administration continues efforts to deport him

item.title: Redrawn GOP congressional map in North Carolina on brink of approval
item.description: The proposed map targets a closely- divided House district currently held by a Democrat.
